ai-tha-ap56:1.3_0: I’ll disturb you, free of lust,
ai-tha-ap56:1.4_0: like a colorful crown of flowers.
ai-tha-ap56:3.3_0: standing in the heaven of the gods,
ai-tha-ap56:4.1_0: Oh, the Buddhas! Oh, the Dhammas!
ai-tha-ap56:4.2_0: Oh, the accomplishments of the Teacher!
ai-tha-ap56:4.4_0: I rejoice in the heavenly realm.
ai-tha-ap56:5.2_0: mindful, I rise in the forest.
ai-tha-ap56:6.1_0: But when I’ve never knew it,
ai-tha-ap56:6.2_0: and no-one is found in me.
ai-tha-ap56:6.3_0: but I don’t see a fever,
ai-tha-ap56:7.2_0: I was struck with a sense of urgency.
ai-tha-ap56:8.1_0: Attaining the four kinds of textual analysis
ai-tha-ap56:9.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Sandiya.
ai-tha-ap56:10.1_0: The fragrance of the senior mendicants is a fourth kind of existence.
